author: Ben Lee
title: Vinyl: Watch the new trailer for Martin Scorsese and Mick Jagger's HBO music drama - US TV
text: It's time to turn it up to 11, because a new trailer for Martin Scorsese and Mick Jagger's HBO music drama has landed.Created by Boardwalk Empire writer Terence Winter, Vinyl tells the story of one mogul on the verge of a rock revolution.Set in 1970s New York, record executive Richie Finestra (Bobby Cannavale) is going all out to resurrect his label after recently falling on hard times.Olivia Wilde, Ray Romano, Ato Essandoh, Juno Temple, Max Casella, JC MacKenzie and Birgitte Hjort SÃ¸rensen also star, among others.Vinyl will premiere on HBO in January 2016. Watch a teaser from August below:
